name: ORS National Report of Prisoner Photographs
description:
This report returns the counts by establishment of prisoners who have no photograph and those who have photographs over 2 years old. Prisoners with bookings commencing 'yesterday' or 'today' are excluded.
PND0017 - v00.00.02 Last Modified: 12/10/17

dataset.name: Prisoners with old photos
dataset.query: DP3_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, DT_PHOTO_POP.POPULATION AS PHOTO_POPULATION FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID, COUNT(AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS Population FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_BEGIN_DATE < TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - 1) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) DT_PHOTO_POP WHERE (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = DT_PHOTO_POP.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS'))), DPf_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, DT_PRISONERSWITHPHOTOCOUNT.PRISONERSWITHPHOTOCOUNT AS COUNT_OF_PRISONERS_WITH_PHOTOS FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID, COUNT(DT_LATEST_FACIAL_IMAGES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AS PrisonersWithPhotoCount FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, OFFENDER_IMAGE_ID, CAPTURE_DATETIME FROM oms_owner.OFFENDER_IMAGES WHERE (OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, CAPTURE_DATETIME) IN (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MAX(CAPTURE_DATETIME) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMAGES WHERE active_flag = 'Y' AND image_view_type = 'FACE' GROUP BY OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) DT_LATEST_FACIAL_IMAGES WHERE (DT_LATEST_FACIAL_IMAGES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.booking_begin_date < TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - 1 GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) DT_PRISONERSWITHPHOTOCOUNT WHERE (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = DT_PRISONERSWITHPHOTOCOUNT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS'))), dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, DT_OLD_PHOTOS.OLDPHOTOCOUNT, DP3_.PHOTO_POPULATION, DPf_.COUNT_OF_PRISONERS_WITH_PHOTOS FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID, COUNT(DT_LATEST_FACIAL_IMAGES.OFFENDER_Book_ID) AS OLDPHOTOCOUNT FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, OFFENDER_IMAGE_ID, CAPTURE_DATETIME FROM oms_owner.OFFENDER_IMAGES WHERE (OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, CAPTURE_DATETIME) IN (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MAX(CAPTURE_DATETIME) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMAGES WHERE active_flag = 'Y' AND image_view_type = 'FACE' GROUP BY OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) DT_LATEST_FACIAL_IMAGES WHERE (DT_LATEST_FACIAL_IMAGES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - TRUNC(DT_LATEST_FACIAL_IMAGES.CAPTURE_DATETIME) > 730) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) DT_OLD_PHOTOS, DP3_, DPf_ WHERE (((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = DT_OLD_PHOTOS.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS'))) AND (DP3_.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AND (DPf_.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID, OLDPHOTOCOUNT, POPULATION - COUNT_OF_PRISONERS_WITH_PHOTOS AS V_PRISONERSMISSINGPHOTOS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Prisoners with photo count
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, DT_PRISONERSWITHPHOTOCOUNT.PRISONERSWITHPHOTOCOUNT FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID, COUNT(DT_LATEST_FACIAL_IMAGES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AS PrisonersWithPhotoCount FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, OFFENDER_IMAGE_ID, CAPTURE_DATETIME FROM oms_owner.OFFENDER_IMAGES WHERE (OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, CAPTURE_DATETIME) IN (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MAX(CAPTURE_DATETIME) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMAGES WHERE active_flag = 'Y' AND image_view_type = 'FACE' GROUP BY OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) DT_LATEST_FACIAL_IMAGES WHERE (DT_LATEST_FACIAL_IMAGES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.booking_begin_date < TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) - 1 GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) DT_PRISONERSWITHPHOTOCOUNT WHERE (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = DT_PRISONERSWITHPHOTOCOUNT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID, PRISONERSWITHPHOTOCOUNT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Population
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, DT_PHOTO_POP.POPULATION FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID, COUNT(AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS Population FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_BEGIN_DATE < TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - 1) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) DT_PHOTO_POP WHERE (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = DT_PHOTO_POP.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID, POPULATION, POPULATION - PRISONERSWITHPHOTOCOUNT AS V_PRISONERSMISSINGPHOTOS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: All Establishments
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (ESTABLISHMENT_CODE <> 'ZZGHI' AND ESTABLISHMENT_CODE <> 'TRN'))

errors.error: Report field OLDPHOTOCOUNT does not have corresponding dataset schema field
Report field OLDPHOTOCOUNT does not have corresponding dataset schema field
